Class LineFollowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • controllers.LineFollowController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, LightSensorListener

    public class LineFollowController
extends java.lang.Thread
implements LightSensorListener
    This class will guide a Lego NXT Robot via a black trail on a white surface.
    Since:
    04-04-2014
    Version:
    1.5
    Author:
    Pim van Hespen

      • lightSensorChanged

        public void lightSensorChanged(Position position,
                      UpdatingSensor updatingsensor,
                      float oldValue,
                      float newValue)
        Description copied from interface: LightSensorListener
        When this class is being implemented, this class will be called upon when one of the light sensors' state changes.
        Specified by:
        lightSensorChanged in interface LightSensorListener
        Parameters:
        position - the position of the sensor used
        updatingsensor - the sensor that is been updated
        oldValue - the value before the change
        newValue - the value after the change
        See Also:
